VII.i.2.E.12.e
.
Selection of Appropriate EP
When processing a claim for reinstatement or continuation of DIC eligibility
based on remarriage upon attaining age 55, assign EP 130.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
